##Problem 1

Reading in and tidying the data
```{r}
data = list.files(path = "./data", full.names = TRUE)

longitudinal_data =
  data_frame(
    arm = str_detect(data, "con"),
    subject_id = str_extract(data, "\\d+(?=.csv)"),
    data = map(data, read_csv)
  )
```
